# ########## Project setup ##########
project(sylvan)
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.8)

add_library(sylvan
  lace.c
  sha2.c
  sylvan_bdd.c
  sylvan_cache.c
  sylvan_common.c
  sylvan_hash.c
  sylvan_ldd.c
  sylvan_mt.c
  sylvan_mtbdd.c
  sylvan_obj.cpp
  sylvan_refs.c
  sylvan_sl.c
  sylvan_stats.c
  sylvan_table.c
)

target_include_directories(sylvan PUBLIC .)
target_link_libraries(sylvan pthread)

set(sylvan_include ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} PARENT_SCOPE)
